name: InfoPay
tag_list: background-check, criminal-records, database, information, phone-lookup, information-check
overview:
The InfoPay affiliate network offers a wide variety of tools for Affiliates such as interactive search forms, landing pages, API access to teasers, private labels, custom price points, and more.

Affiliates access these promotional tools in one centralized location called the Affiliate Center. Why login to several different affiliate programs when you can login once into our affiliate network and get all the tools you need.

Serious affiliates need serious tools, which is why InfoPay developed the private label affiliate program. We understand affiliates need to consider important issues like Quality Score, Creating Brand Awareness, CAN-Spam, Copyrights, and Providing Value for the Visitor. With our help affiliates can be running their very own merchant website. The Private Label will match the look & feel of your existing website and can be up quickly. Complete with all the technology to put Affiliates like yourself in a position to build a strong brand of your own with staying power for a long time.

Our affiliate network, and specifically the private label affiliate solution, allows you to add more value to your visitors by keeping them on your website throughout the process and integrating our service and experience into yours.
